bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of five types of yin 飲 , rheum, disease. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 47 lists a xin fa ban xia san fang 新法半夏散方 , recipe for a powder with ban xia based on a new approach: 治五飲酒癖 , “It cures the five types of rheum and wine aggregation-illness”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 lists three different versions of ‘five types of rheum’: First, in Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 , paragraph on tan yin 痰飲 , phlegm rheum: 支、 留、伏、溢、懸 , “propping [rheum], abiding [rheum], deep-lying [rheum], spillage [rheum], and suspended [rheum]”. Second, Substance Entry zhu 术：留、癖、痰、 溢、流 , “abiding [rheum], aggregation-illness [rheum], phlegm [rheum], spillage [rheum], and flowing [rheum]”. Third, Substance Entry yuan hua 芫花：支、懸、伏、 痰、溢 , “propping [rheum], suspended [rheum], deep-lying [rheum], phlegm [rheum], and spillage [rheum]”. Wu ying 五癭 , five types of goiter [1]

Pathological Condition Combined Designation of five types of ying 癭 , goiter. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 24: 五癭丸方，取鹿靨以佳 酒浸令沒，炙乾，納酒中，更炙令香，含，咽汁，味盡更易，盡十具愈 , “Recipe for the pills for five types of goiter . Roast a deer’s thyroid gland soaked in good wine until it is dry. Place in wine again and roast again and again until a fragrant smell emerges. Place in the mouth and swallow the juice. Change for a new one once the flavor has ended. After ten times [the disease] will be healed”.
